JONES
v.
CITY OF DURHAM. No. 137A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 14, 2006. Stewart W. Fisher, Carlos E. Mahoney, Robert B. Glenn, Jr., Durham, for Linda Jones. Reginald B. Gillespie, Jr., Durham, for City of Durham, et al. Mark A. Davis, Raleigh, for County Commissioners, et al. T. Marie Mobley, Smithfield, for Academy of Trial Lawyers.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th day of March 2006 by N.C. Academy of Trial Lawyers for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). By order of the Court in conference this the 14th day of March 2006."
